questions.title: Background
questions.text: We are interested in studying how users learn to use computer applications. Specifically, when there are multiple ways of completing the same task, how do users learn the 'better/expert' ways.  For example, using the keyboard shortcut to save a document instead of selecting 'save' from the menu is typically a faster way of accomplishing the same task. We are interested in learning what tools/methods users employ to learn these 'better/expert' techniques.

questions.instructions: Do you use computer applications frequently for work? If so, which applications?
